content:
Hi,
How I can setup FHIR server to retrieve patient data via REST APIs/
How I can setup FHIR server to retrieve and create patient data via REST APIs

@Kirpal I changed the topic so your question was separate from the thread you'd put it in. Your question is a little broad. Are you trying to use one of the open source servers? Are you trying to create your own server? What language are you using? What parts are you struggling with?
